entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as the one who told Harry and others to keep him from doing magic at all costs.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character in the conversation with Mrs. Figg.

entities.name: mrs. figg

relationships.description: Dumbledore ordered Mrs. Figg to keep Harry from doing magic at all costs.
